trans-unit.source: Provides access to the protected-configuration providers for the current application's configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 为当前应用程序的配置文件中提供对受保护配置提供程序的访问。

trans-unit.source: The ProtectedConfiguration class allows you to obtain information about the providers available to protect sensitive configuration data.
trans-unit.target: ProtectedConfiguration 类，可获取有关可用于保护敏感的配置数据提供程序的信息。

trans-unit.source: You typically use the standard providers, but you can also create custom providers by deriving from the <xref:System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProvider> class.
trans-unit.target: 你通常使用标准提供程序，但你还可以通过从<xref:System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProvider>类</xref:System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProvider>派生来创建自定义提供程序

trans-unit.source: For more information about protected configuration, see [Encrypting Configuration Information Using Protected Configuration](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关受保护的配置的详细信息，请参阅[加密配置信息使用受保护的配置](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The name of the data protection provider.
trans-unit.target: 数据保护提供程序的名称。

trans-unit.source: This a constant string variable that contains the name of the data-protection provider made available by the system to protect a configuration section.
trans-unit.target: 这包含数据保护提供程序的名称的常量字符串变量可由系统来保护的配置节。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the default protected-configuration provider.
trans-unit.target: 获取默认的受保护配置提供程序的名称。

trans-unit.source: The default provider is identified by the `defaultProvider` attribute of the `<configProtectedData>` configuration-file element.
trans-unit.target: 默认的提供程序由`defaultProvider`属性`<configProtectedData>`配置文件元素。

trans-unit.source: The value must correspond to the name of one of the providers added in the `<providers>` subsection of the `<configProtectedData>` section.
trans-unit.target: 值必须对应于某个中添加的提供程序的名称`<providers>`的小节`<configProtectedData>`部分。

trans-unit.source: The `<configProtectedData>` section can also be accessed through an instance of the <xref:System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationSection> class.
trans-unit.target: `<configProtectedData>`部分还可以通过实例的<xref:System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationSection>类。</xref:System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationSection>

trans-unit.source: The name of the default protected-configuration provider.
trans-unit.target: 默认受保护配置提供程序的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the protected data section.
trans-unit.target: 受保护的数据部分的名称。

trans-unit.source: This is a constant string variable that contains the name of the protected data section.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个常量字符串变量，包含受保护的数据部分的名称。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of the installed protected-configuration providers.
trans-unit.target: 获取已安装的受保护配置提供程序的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProviderCollection"></xref> collection of installed <xref href="System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProvider"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProviderCollection"> </xref>集合安装<xref href="System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProvider"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The name of the RSA provider.
trans-unit.target: RSA 提供程序的名称。

trans-unit.source: This a constant string variable that contains the name of the RSA provider made available by the system to protect a configuration section.
trans-unit.target: 这包含 RSA 提供程序的名称的常量字符串变量可由系统来保护的配置节。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。
